alert.note: Alert for Calumet; Outagamie; Shawano (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 2:32PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...LINE OF THUNDERSTORMS ALONG LAKE DEVELOPING ALONG LAKE BREEZE BOUNDARY ACROSS EAST-CENTRAL... At 231 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a north-south line of developing thunderstorms extending from Kaukauna, or near Appleton, to Shawano. Thesse storm are developing along the lake breeze boundary, visible on satellite, and moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Darboy around 235 PM CDT. Menasha and Kimberly around 245 PM CDT. Kaukauna around 250 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Little Chute, Appleton and Black Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
